## Video

The Ionian Mode is the first mode of the major scale. They are essentially the same scale.\
C Ionian Scale Notes: C D E F G A B\
Ionian Scale Formula: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7\
Ionian Scale Intervals: W W H W W W H
